name: Positive display polarity is advantageous for both younger and older adults
desc: A little for children and generally universally for adults, light mode is better for visual acuity by a large margin. And for reading speed, very slightly better than dark mode.

name: The Entropy of Words: Learnability & Expressivity across Languages
loc: University of Tübingen, University of Cambridge etc
desc: Entropy of words is a good measure of learnability and expressivity of languages. It is a good measure of the complexity of a language. We end up speaking at the same speed of information, regardless of the language.
